html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-03182023-03-31TC, FIN
ActCanada Marine Act
SubjectPrince Rupert Port Authority's Borrowing Limit ** Increase **
PrecisOrder approving the Supplementary Letters Patent provision amending Article 9 of the Letters Patent issued to the PRINCE RUPERT PORT AUTHORITY (PRPA) to increase the limit on the power of the PRPA to borrow money on its credit for port purposes from $139 million to $255 million in order to allow it to further develop its strategic infrastructure and to bring its borrowing limit to a level on par with its current financial capacity.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Prince Rupert Port Authority's Borrowing Limit ** Increase **
precis: Order approving the Supplementary Letters Patent provision amending Article 9 of the Letters Patent issued to the PRINCE RUPERT PORT AUTHORITY (PRPA) to increase the limit on the power of the PRPA to borrow money on its credit for port purposes from $139 million to $255 million in order to allow it to further develop its strategic infrastructure and to bring its borrowing limit to a level on par with its current financial capacity.
